body:
hi im chertan the proud yasuo main and I believe that everyone should play yasuo because all you have to do is press eqeqeqeqeqeqeqeqeqeqeqeqeq to ace the other team the fact that yasuo can dash to avoid zoe the fucking broken lolis q is proof that he is the best champ to play I am so dedicated to yasuo that my name itself is the almighty wind blade yasuo combo which is the key blade but more advanced because u can block their projectile ultis to outplay them further and to cause more mental damage to their brains so they should be inflicted with autism and tilt which is always a good thing I hope that with this I have convinced u why u should play yasuo and I hope to continually bring cancer to this world

shit regards

chertan the parent less yasuo main
